{{ardayearheader: * After finishing their council, [[Manwë]] decides that the [[Valar]] shall make war on [[Morgoth
Year of the Trees 1050: Melkor]].<ref name="Annals"/> This was known as the [[Battle of the Powers]].<ref>{{S

{{ardayearheader: * Over the next two years, the [[Valar]] set a guard about [[Cuiviénen]] to protect the Elves from battle. The servants of Melkor retreat to [[Utumno]].<ref name="Annals">{{AA
